entry.title: My mini Page
entry.content: I was thinking about setting up my page for some while and this day has finally come. Today I came across Jekyll and it is looking like a perfect fit. As I am already doing a lot of web development it would feel wrong to use some webpages building platform. On the other hand, it also seemed like overkill to do everything from scratch. So Jekyll is a perfect fit. No worries with DevOps, no Database, no complex setups. Just some markdown files and git push and that is it. I have also found this amazing template HydeJack which served as boiler plate for my page.
entry.summary: I was thinking about setting up my page for some while and this day has finally come. Today I came across Jekyll and it is looking like a perfect fit. As I am already doing a lot of web development it would feel wrong to use some webpages building platform. On the other hand, it also seemed like overkill to do everything from scratch. So Jekyll is a perfect fit. No worries with DevOps, no Database, no complex setups. Just some markdown files and git push and that is it. I have also found this amazing template HydeJack which served as boiler plate for my page.
